abstract: Ray Aghayan, costume designer who worked for many Hollywood stars, dies at age 83.
snippet: Mr. Aghayan was the costume designer for stars like Judy Garland, Barbra Streisand, Diana Ross and Julie Andrews.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Aghayan was the costume designer for stars like Judy Garland, Barbra Streisand, Diana Ross and Julie Andrews.

headline.main: Ray Aghayan, Costume Designer, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Ray Aghayan, Costume Designer, Dies at 83
headline.seo: Ray Aghayan, Costume Designer, Dies at 83
